TopicTitle: Kerbal Career Mode - Vanilla | Channel Re-Launch

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I am re-launching my YouTube channel .. RalorWolfLP. The channel started about a year ago but life got in the way and I'm just now getting back into things. I haven't played the game since the last video I posted (LP Video #5).

I've downloaded the updates and my new videos (#6 and above) are all about me relearning the game and exploring the new features and parts. I play with a completely vanilla install (no mods) and am working my way through the research tree.

I haven't gotten around to updating my intro or outro so I've chosen to make these new videos a continuation of the existing LP season. Once I get some spare time to play around, I'll be updating with new bells and whistles for season two. Hope you join me and have some fun along the way.

P.S. I forgot to mention, my play style means that I try never to use the reset mission button and if I strand a pilot, I try and rescue him. I do however do some off-camera tests on works in progress.

I'm going ahead and imbedding a video here. This is the only one I'm going to post here. I find threads with multiple videos in them to be kind of annoying. This video is the first in my career mode play. It takes me a while to catch on to some of the new mechanics but I'm a quick learner I swear.

Enjoy.
